name: Rajiv Giri
title: Independent Digital and Technology Solutions Professional
summary: Digital and Technology Solutions professional with 9+ years in data-intensive environments, including 3+ years of hands-on IT experience built upon a foundation of 6+ years in pharmaceutical operations. Skilled in data analysis, application support, and maintaining data accuracy in regulated environments.

responsibilities: Led client engagements across various industries, focusing on business processes and technical requirements
Mentored junior team members and ensured quality through reviews and feedback
Security GRC: Resolved security issues, validated TVM dashboard data, and provided data-driven recommendations
OFSAA: Created/maintained RTMs for 500+ KDEs and validated data integrity post-configuration
CRM Implementation: Collaborated on business needs analysis and successful CRM launches

experience.position: Technical Application Support Consultant (POS 3rd/4th level Support)
responsibilities: Provided application support for Vision Commerce Suite POS system
Triaged, diagnosed, and reproduced application defects using error logs, SQL queries, and code review
Tested and deployed patches/releases across environments
Administered virtual machine servers and Beanstore applications
Performed data warehouse integration testing post-ETL
Identified and documented data quality issues
Created process flowcharts using Visio to document data flows
Performed high-volume data entry and validation of patient information
Participated in system migration from MS DOS to web-based application
Developed SIG short codes that increased productivity by 20%
Assisted an average of 30 customers daily with prescription needs

education.institution: MAX Technical Training (formerly Cinci Code IT)

certifications: Database Foundations: Intro to Databases - LinkedIn Learning
Introduction to Prompt Engineering for Generative AI (2023) - Google Data Analytics
